商品名稱: COOFANDY 男款 亞麻 襯衫 短袖 休閒 襯衫 鈕扣 襯衫 男款 海灘 夏季 婚禮 襯衫
SKU: 尺寸: Small顏色: Light Denim blue
留言內容: This shirt is stylish and comfy.  Please be aware that it is 70% linen.  I realized this after I washed and dried in our dryer.  The tag calls for dry cleaning and no machine drying.  Thankfully the shirt survived my conventional washing and drying.  But I guess I will have to resort to line drying it next time...which is a pain.  I probably would not have purchased if I paid attention to the material description.  One last note, the shirt fits a little large.  Amazon suggested medium for me, but looking back I think I should have ordered a small.

商品名稱: COOFANDY 男款 亞麻 襯衫 短袖 休閒 襯衫 鈕扣 襯衫 男款 海灘 夏季 婚禮 襯衫
SKU: 尺寸: Small顏色: Clear Blue
留言內容: I ordered the black shirt and it arrived on time. Once opened, I saw the front flap that hides the buttons has small horizontal white threads where each button is below. This seems dumb on a black shirt, and not as advertised.I went to the product site and checked the pictures for the black shirt, and there were no white stitches showing. Today I came back and noticed they have changed the first picture to now show the white stitches, however, as you scroll through the other pictures the original black thread is shown.These are great shirts, I have a couple of them, so if you don’t mind white stitches you will like the quality. These are also not easily wrinkled which is a good thing.If the manufacturer or distributor is watching these reviews, make the stitching black and I’ll buy this again.

SKU: 尺寸: X-Large顏色: White
留言內容: Was concerned that I might have to size up for shirts made overseas.  Nope.  Fits perfectly.  I’m 6’4” 220 lbs with a slightly athletic build.  I ordered XL and it’s as though it was tailor made.  Slightly roomy but not too much giving it a true camp shirt fit.  The material is soft with a linen texture that I can only describe as elegant.  Guys, this is a $200+ shirt in high end branded stores—equal in quality, design, and fit.  I took a chance and bought 4 in different colors—really glad I did.  Buy your normal size that you wear here in the States.  You won’t be sorry.
